snippet: The search by Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the Devils, for outside investment to stabilize the team’s finances has apparently ended successfully with an estimated cash deal of $200 million.
abstract: Search by New Jersey Devils controlling owner Jeff Vanderbeek for outside investment to stabilize the team’s finances has apparently ended successfully with an estimated cash deal of $200 million.
lead_paragraph: The search by Jeff Vanderbeek, the controlling owner of the Devils, for outside investment to stabilize the team’s finances has apparently ended successfully with an estimated cash deal of $200 million.
